Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.q1_item1: Account information: Name, email address, and profile picture from your Google Account.
Privacy.q1_item2: Usage data: Daily notes, dashboard configurations, and application preferences.
Privacy.q1_item3: Third-party service data: Jira tasks and Calendar events (when you choose to connect these services).
Privacy.q2_item1: To provide dashboard features and application services.
Privacy.q2_item2: To generate AI-powered summaries and reports.
Privacy.q2_item3: To export data in various formats (e.g., Excel).
Privacy.q2_item4: To improve and personalize your experience on the platform.
Privacy.q3_item1: Data is stored on Supabase with encryption at rest and in transit.
Privacy.q3_item2: Row-Level Security (RLS) is enforced to ensure users can only access their own data.
Privacy.q3_item3: External service tokens are encrypted before storage and are never shared.
Privacy.q4_text: We do not sell, trade, or share your personal information with third parties. Your data is only used to provide the services described above. We may share data only if required by law.
Privacy.q5_subtitle: Under the Personal Data Protection Act (PDPA) and applicable data protection laws, you have the right to:
Privacy.q5_item2: Request correction of your personal data.
Privacy.q5_item3: Request deletion of your personal data.
Privacy.q5_item4: Withdraw your consent at any time.
Privacy.q6_text: We use essential cookies to maintain your session and authentication state. We do not use advertising or third-party tracking cookies.
Privacy.q7_text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. If we make significant changes, we will notify you through the application.
Privacy.q8_text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through the in-app support system or email us at le.phurin@gmail.com.
